name: SoulBound (itch) (SchmoovinStudios)
description:
Soulbound is a pvp platformer where one player controls a platformer character whilst the other player controls the enemies. It is a modern twist on the classic 2D platformer genre with a retro aesthetic.

The ninja must progress through a randomly generated level to gain points whilst the ghost must defeat them by controlling enemies. Once the ninja is defeated the players swap roles and whoever reaches the goal as the ninja wins.
